name: KFMPlus
0:
”Alexa, lock my front door”
”Alexa, unlock the back door”
”Alexa, turn off the lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Jswpac ip lock, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your Jswpac ip lock using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !

How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is KFM Pro and login in it, search all device of ip lock. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable KFM Pro skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Tap discover device in Alexa app to discover your KFM Pro.

After linking your KFM Pro account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control ip lock to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, lock my front door"

Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show (1st Generation)
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen

more information you can visit https://www.jswpac.com/

if you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: https://www.jswpac.com/?goto=contactUs
